description: Asset category associated with this user-defined field under the MS14 configuration, used to scope where the field appears and applies.
Database column name for the field in the MS14 schema/version, used for storage and mapping.
Underlying inventory table in MS14 where the field resides.
Data type for the field in the MS14 schema, guiding storage, validation, and UI behavior.
Configured length or precision for the MS14 field; for text, max characters; for numbers, total digits.
Number of decimal places for numeric fields in MS14; used with length to define scale and precision. If not numeric, likely null; confirm with SME.
Human-readable label displayed in the UI for this field in MS14; may differ from the technical column name.
Database column name for the corresponding field in the MS15 schema/version, supporting migration or cross-version mapping.
Tab order index controlling cursor progression among inputs on the MS14 UI screen for this asset type.
Input control style used in the MS14 UI (e.g., text box, dropdown, checkbox), affecting how users enter or select data.
Identifier of the MS14 UI view where this field is rendered for the asset, used to bind screen elements to data.
Configured input limit for the field in MS14 (likely maximum characters or value constraints); confirm with SME.
Flag indicating whether the field is shared across multiple asset types or modules, influencing reuse and governance.
User-facing title or section name for the asset context in MS14 where the field appears.
Data type for the field in the MS15 schema, used for storage, validation, and UI configuration.
Maximum length or precision for the field in MS15; for text, character limit; for numbers, total digits; -1 likely indicates unlimited; confirm with SME.
